title: xerath update - thoughts
body:
{{champion:101}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:101}} 

I'm finding the transition to the zoom out view tricky.

The extra barrage is useful to pick up strays that may have just survived 3.

 The zoomout mechanic has its intent in the right place (particularly when multipile targets are scattered) but I'm not used to it yet.

I am finding that R is not as responsive or is slower to get to the target - either way they are not as easy to hit as they used to be.

Any other xerath players got thoughts on the new change? What about builds - will you change? I've been looking at throwing liandry's into the mix which I never used to do.
